idea:
Dakshakriti is a platform that provides holistic support and solutions to the multifaceted components that are essential for inclusive and sustainable development for all.
Dakshakriti is an attempt to develop, promote social entrepreneurship, in order to generate empowerment and bring prosperity in the life of people and communities. We target holistic development of the individuals and communities through research, skill development, vocational training, creating opportunities, generating livelihood and empowerment.
We aim at creating a space to bring forward the lived experience of individuals and communities through a strong and long-term relationship with the people involved in field of empowering business and empowering lives. We work towards building a network of diverse individuals, communities, organizations, and professionals, by providing them a space to share their knowledge and experiences.
Dakshakriti envisions a world where technological and social innovations, education, skill development, and economic empowerment are rooted in sustainability to bring prosperity to the life of everyone.
name: Dakshakriti Product and Services Private Limited

idea:
InterviewAir is an AI based Asynchronous Video Profiling technology, which assists Corporate HRs for Talent Acquisition in India, to start with (aspiring for global markets), making sure that job seekers from remote areas (Tier 2/3&4) get an opportunity for employment. The product works as an interface between Job Seekers, Colleges, Vocational Institutions, Corporates, Consultants & Trainers, and it can bring together the Candidates looking for jobs to the Corporates without being physically present for the multiple rounds of job interviews (both technical and non-technical).
The platform also provides AI driven interview feedback mechanism to improve candidateâ€™s interpersonal skills, increasing their chance of employability, using video analytics.
name: VRRSP TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
